short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you be focused and productive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Set a pomodoro timer and block distracting websites to help you be productive.

Pomodoro Timer
- Set a work time and a break time
- Plays a sound when focus or break session ends
- Focus and break times are configurable

Website Blocker
- Blocks distracting websites during your focus and/or break session
- Big social media sites are blocked by default
- Add custom websites to block or disable default ones
